unlocWelcomeMessage: Welcome, and thank you for playing Unabridged! In this guide you will find basic information about things in this pack that are important to know. This is not going to be a tutorial, learning about and exploring different mods on your own is part of the fun. There is no specific path you should be taking.
author: BBoldt

pageList.locText: This pack has custom mining level tweaks on both ores and tools that allow you to progress through the levels no matter what path you take. If you see an ore you can't mine, hold shift to display the mining level in Waila and search that level in NEI. It will show you tools which can mine that level. The following chart is how you would do it from a purely non-Tinkers' Construct standpoint.

Stone/Flint can mine:
Iron, Coal, Apatite, Zinc, Sulfur, Saltpeter

Iron can mine:
Osmium, Tin, Ferrous, Lead, Lapis, Copper, Previous Tiers

Bronze/Osmium can mine:
BOP gems, Certus, Gold, Redstone, Previous Tiers

Steel/Manasteel/Thaumium can mine:
Diamond, Emerald, Obsidian, Yellorite, Silver, Previous Tiers

Shiny/Heavy Duty/Flux-Infused/Terra Shatterer can mine:
Ardite, Previous Tiers

Dark Steel Pickaxe/Pickaxe of Distortion can mine:
Cobalt, Previous Tiers

This list stays true if you use Tinkers' Construct as well, but there are many more paths you can take there that are not listed here. If you do use Tinkers Construct, you should also note that your tool can level up as you use it, and can go one level beyond the mining level it began as. Also note that tool parts may be exchanged for better ones as you progress through the game. Just make sure your tool is fully repaired before you try to swap parts.

Is your chest storage area a mess?
Can you not find that very specific item you're looking for?
Try '/search ITEM'. It will display a marker above the chest containing the item you are looking for.
'search clear' to clear your search.
Looking for a direct link to the documentation for a mod? Try '/docs mod' and it should point you in the right direction.
